August 15, 2012

Cheddar for Mac Is Out!

I interviewed Sam earlier this week and even before that, I was a big fan of Cheddar. Today, he announced the Mac app for Cheddar and it's amazingly beautiful! The UI Sam has created for the brand is really nice and the pricing is ridiculously affordable. Check it out and download the app here!
